original_text: And Mephibosheth lived in Jerusalem, because he always ate at the king’s table; he was lame in both feet.
korean_text: 므비보셋이 항상 왕의 상에서 먹으므로 예루살렘에 사니라 그는 두 발을 다 절더라

sentences.original_text: because he always ate at the king's table
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 항상 왕의 식탁에서 음식을 먹었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: he was lame in both feet
